author: yoosee

changelog.release_notes: Fixed initializing weather update causing LOADING.. all the time.

Now Weather cached for 10 minutes. Weather provider fallback from Weather.gov to OpenWeatherMap.org.
Text adjustments and Bug fixes.
Added Diorite build for Pebble 2.

Changed Weather provider from OpenWeather to Weather.gov. possibly improve weather condition accuracy (I hope Pebble SDK officially provide weather API).
Fixed problem Clock hands and info are disappeared when back from notification.

Date font changed to more readable one.
Bluetooth indicator possibly fixed.

Fix redraw delay issue when Color configuration updated.
Display of Pebble Health Steps is configurable.

description:
Analog Clock watchface with Date, Weather and Health Steps, Bluetooth indicator. All Color configurable.

Because of Weather provider inaccuracy, now it uses Weather.gov as a default provider, then try OpenWeatherMap.org for fallback. Data cached for 10 minutes, and automatically updated in every 30 minutes.

Please try "Zirconia" watchface if you're looking for Analog watch with similar functions.

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed initializing weather update causing LOADING.. all the time.

title: Obsidian
